title: 04/23/21 DPS Hour 3 Anthony Gonzalez
itunes:title: 04/23/21 DPS Hour 3 Anthony Gonzalez
description:
Ross Tucker is in for Dan today. Anthony Gonzalez talks to Ross about the bill he is proposing for college athletes name, image and likeness. Anthony would like to see a limit on boosters' influence on high school and college athletes to preserve recruitment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Ross Tucker is in for Dan today. Anthony Gonzalez talks to Ross about the bill he is proposing for college athletes name, image and likeness. Anthony would like to see a limit on boosters' influence on high school and college athletes to preserve recruitment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
